title: Why Troy Baker Isn't in Borderlands 3 - Kinda Funny Games Daily 09.30.19
description:
Tim and Greg discuss Troy's revelation that unionization is the reason he isn't back as Rhys.

Time Stamps - 
00:03:30 - Housekeeping
Andy's Zero-Death Run Ends Very Quickly https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P8KQEULQXow
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: (JUST FOR MONDAY)
http://www.patreon.com/ReRetroGames
Black Jack
Mohammed Mohammed
The Roper Report   -
00:05:45 - Why Troy Baker isn’t in Borderlands 3, Kirk McKeand @ VG247
00:07:52 Best Friend Q. - With the reveal this morning that Troy Baker, as a SAG-AFTRA member, couldn't reprise his role of Rhys in Borderlands 3 because Gearbox wouldn't go union, do you think this is something we'll see more of? - Chad Betteridge
00:23:55 - Bungie Wants a non-Destiny game out by 2025, Matt Kim @ IGN
00:32:52 - Gears 5 Microtransactions, Eddie @ GameSpot
00:39:08 - New Brain Age for Switch in Japan, Brian Ashcraft @ KOTAKU
00:40:56 - Atari VCS teams up with Antstream Arcade
00:45:45 - Kojima’s bb can talk to you through your PS4 controller
00:52:11 - Out today
00:48:45 -  Quib
00:50:50 - Third Love
Reader mail   -
00:54:18 - Minecraft Earth is getting early access in October. Do you see those not into Minecraft downloading this more interactive version? Or is this just a game for people who enjoyed the regular Minecraft? Will this increase the visibility of the brand of Minecraft, like Pokemon Go did for the brand of Pokemon? - BJ Bernardo
00:57:08 - On Wednesdays show while talking about Sony locking down one of the modes in Call of Duty Modern Warfare the sentiment seemed to be,” Yeah it sucks, but that’s just how it is.”Since Phil Spencer has taken over Xbox he has been on record stating that he doesn’t want to exclude gamers from a gun, mission, etc. and that it is bad for the gamers and bad for games in general. To his credit, Xbox has not had any exclusive content in their marketing deals since that time. I believe this has hurt Xbox and their bottom line but he has kept his word. Why shouldn’t we hold PlayStation to the same standard? - King
01:03:10 - Squad Up:Frankfurtter(Steam)
01:04:00 - You‘re Wrong
This Week’s Hosts:
TUESDAY: Greg and Imran
WEDNESDAY: Greg and O’Dell Harmond Jr.
THURSDAY: Greg and Imran
GAMESCAST: Thursday, 10/3 @ 2 p.m.
Tim, Greg, Fran, Imran
FRIDAY: Imarn and Tim
